Comments.Message:
I would like to make a notice of thanks to this user for properly following the Posting Guidelines and attaching the additional messaging of the error.

I REALLY REALLY appreciate this, you have no idea.
Tree is for a large part rewritten, I have yet to get to the Optimizer. One of the reasons being that I've never even used the optimizer myself.... :)
Build upgrade list doesn't support the cost constraint, but I'll take a look to make sure it doesn't crash.
I think this was already fixed, but I'll leave it open until next release just in case.

@Jothay
Np, glad to help any way I can. Love this program. Keep up the good work!
This seems to be fixed in v2.3.3. Issue is resolved.
